DOC.brief_summary: This project evaluate effect combined economic psycho-social intervention reduce risky sexual activity consequence . The main hypothesis test risky sexual activity result sexually transmit infection ( STIs ) reduce intervention counseling , regular STI testing , positive reinforcement use cash reward . The intervention implement population young people rural Tanzania conventional behavioral change intervention limit effect battle generalize HIV epidemic .
DOC.brief_title: Rewarding Sexually Transmitted Infection ( STI ) Prevention Control Tanzania
